# Mari

𒈠 Marine 𒈣 MA = ship SI 𒋛 = Kahn ⋍ Horn 𓄏
𒈠𒌷𒆠 ma-uru / ma-ri ki : city of Mari ⇔ 𒈨𒅕 Mêr

𓂟 𓂋 𓏤 𓇋 𓇋 𓈖 𓄿 𓀘 =
𓅓 𓂝 𓂋 𓏤 𓇋 𓇋 𓈖 𓄿 𓌙 𓀀
μάρη (márē) Arm ⇔ Amorites ⋍ Martu Mariners mortal 𓀏 man

𒉌𒉿𒅈𒈨𒅕 Nûr-Mêr, also Niwâr-Mêr (𒉌𒉿𒅈𒈨𒅕 ni-wa-ar-me-er, c. 2153-2148 BCE) was a ruler of the city of Mari
𒅖𒈣𒀭𒁕𒃶 Ishmaᴿ-Dagan (𒅖𒈣𒀭𒁕𒃶, Ish-ma-D da-gan, c. 2190-2146 BCE) was a ruler of the city of Mari
